content.title: Pseudoaneurysm (False Aneurysm)
content.definition: A pseudoaneurysm is a contained rupture of the arterial wall where blood escapes through a defect in one or more layers but is contained by surrounding tissues, forming a pulsatile hematoma that communicates with the arterial lumen.

anatomy.wall_composition: Unlike true aneurysms (all 3 layers), pseudoaneurysms lack normal arterial wall structure
anatomy.containment: Blood contained by adventitia, surrounding tissue, or thrombus only
anatomy.neck: Communication tract between artery and sac (important for treatment planning)
anatomy.sac: Fibrous capsule containing blood and often laminated thrombus

etiology.iatrogenic: Most common cause - arterial catheterization, surgery, biopsies
etiology.infection: Mycotic pseudoaneurysm from vessel wall infection
etiology.spontaneous: Rare - associated with connective tissue disorders

diagnosis.duplex_ultrasound: First-line imaging - characteristic to-and-fro waveform in neck
diagnosis.findings: Sac with swirling flow (yin-yang sign), narrow neck, systolic inflow/diastolic outflow
diagnosis.cta: For complex cases, preoperative planning, visceral locations

treatment.ultrasound_guided_compression: Original technique - prolonged pressure over neck
treatment.thrombin_injection: Current preferred treatment for femoral pseudoaneurysms
treatment.surgical_repair: Failed percutaneous treatment, complex anatomy, infected

vs_true_aneurysm.pseudoaneurysm: Contained rupture, lacks true arterial wall
vs_true_aneurysm.true_aneurysm: Dilatation of all 3 arterial wall layers

content.statement: Pseudoaneurysm (False Aneurysm) is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pseudoaneurysm that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Pseudoaneurysm (False Aneurysm) helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Pseudoaneurysm (False Aneurysm) include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Pseudoaneurysm (False Aneurysm).

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts

clinical_pearls: To-and-fro waveform in neck is pathognomonic on duplex
Yin-yang sign (swirling flow) seen in sac on color Doppler
Thrombin injection is first-line treatment for femoral pseudoaneurysms
Compression therapy success rate lower in anticoagulated patients

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
